name: Sorcerissimo
description:
A multiplayer wizard battler made for #TOJam12

Slap objects to collect runes, use those runes to build spells and use those spells to eliminate each other!

Controls (Only supports 2 or more players):

Note: In game prompts reference a dualshock 4 controller, but others should be supported

Join Game: Options/Start/Enter

Ready Up: Triangle/Spacebar

Slap: Circle/Spacebar

Move: Left Stick/WASD

Bring up spell builder: Hold L2/Right Click

Cast Spell: Click/R2

Toggle Spells: Square/Q

Build Spells: (when spell builder is open) Any Face Button/1-8 on the keyboard.

Tools Used:

Game: Unity 5.6, Relief Terrain Shaders, Rewired Input Manager, ShaderForge, Intellij Rider

Environment: Blender, Photoshop, Speedtree

Characters: Maya, Quixel Suite, XNormal, ZBrush
